'''Midlander Bow Billet''' is a [[Forging Material]] used in [[forging]] 4-Star [[bows]] of the [[Aranara Series]] and [[Beaumont Series]].

==Alchemy==
{{Recipe
|type = Converting
|Northlander Bow Billet = 1
|Dream Solvent = 2
|sort = Northlander Bow Billet;Dream Solvent
}}
{{Recipe

|Borderland Bow Billet = 1
|Dream Solvent = 2
|sort = Borderland Bow Billet;Dream Solvent
}}
